trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>DELETE</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic deletes the specified Media Services account in the specified subscription.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>DELETE</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic deletes the specified Media Services account in the specified subscription.

trans-unit.source: The request may be specified as follows (replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;accountName%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your account name):
trans-unit.target: The request may be specified as follows (replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;accountName%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your account name):

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about error codes, see <link xlink:href="fb7d4575-9ceb-46f9-84da-34ce4df84894" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Media Services Management Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about error codes, see <link xlink:href="fb7d4575-9ceb-46f9-84da-34ce4df84894" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Media Services Management Error Codes</link>.
